1.2.name: wordpress/newposts
1.2.description: Whenever a visitor sees your blog, a cookie is stored on his browser so there is a way to detect the last time that she visited it. Based upon this information, the next time she views your blog, the newest posts will have a "new" image attached to their title, so the novelties will catch the user's attention.
